contentType.name: SBG-CONTACT-LIST
contentType.description: This content type will be used to create a group of contacts as a list which can be used across multiple pages.

contentType.name: SBG-CHANNEL-DESCRIPTOR
contentType.description:
This CT is a Attribute descriptor for channels. It is defined by adding a property sheet such as:
<property-sheet title="SBG Channel Descriptor" width="640" height="480" context="/coe" url="/secure/sheets/COE-objecteditor.jsp" type="com.vignette.as.ui.cm.descriptor.DescriptorAttributeObjectEditor" persistor-type="com.vignette.as.ui.cm.descriptor.ChannelDescriptorAttributePersistor" display-weighting="3"> <script>/secure/sheets/COE-submit-handler.js</script> <script>/descriptor/SBG-CHANNEL-DESCRIPTOR</script> <script>/descriptorAttribute/SBG-CHANNEL-DESCRIPTOR</script> <command-spec id="doRelatorRemove" type="com.vignette.as.ui.cm.coe.struts.commands.RemoveRelatorRowCommand"/> <required-capability>VCM:CHANNEL_WRITE</required-capability> </property-sheet>

attributeDefinition.name: NAVIGATION-COLUMNS
attributeDefinition.toolTip: This property is applicable mostly for Top Level Channels.

attributeDefinition.name: NAVIGATION-ALIGNMENT
attributeDefinition.toolTip: This property is applicable for Top Level Channels Only

attributeDefinition.name: NAVIGATION-COLUMN-NUMBER
attributeDefinition.toolTip: This property is NOT applicable for Top Level Channels .

attributeDefinition.name: SUB-NAVIGATION-ITEMS
attributeDefinition.toolTip: Select what to show under a Navigation Channel.

attributeDefinition.name: NAVIGATION-PLACEHOLDER-CHANNEL
attributeDefinition.toolTip: If checked, this channel is treated as place holder channel for its sub elements. No link will be build for such channels.
